Description: Capital city with historical landmarks, beaches, and cultural experiences.
Activities: Fort St. George, Marina Beach, Kapaleeshwarar Temple, museums, art galleries, Bharatanatyam dance performances.

Description: Temple city known for its magnificent Meenakshi Amman Temple and rich cultural heritage.
Activities: Meenakshi Amman Temple, Thirumalai Nayak Mahal, Alagar Kovil Temple, sound and light show, exploring bazaars.

Description: Southernmost tip of India, known for its stunning sunrise and sunset views.
Activities: Vivekananda Rock Memorial, Kanyakumari Beach, Thanumalayan Temple, Padmanabhapuram Palace, boat rides.

Description: Hill station offering scenic beauty, colonial architecture, and cool climate.
Activities: Toy train ride, boating on Ooty Lake, Doddabetta Peak, Botanical Garden, exploring tea plantations.

Description: Picturesque hill station known for its waterfalls, lakes, and trekking trails.
Activities: Trekking to Dolphin's Nose and Bear Shola Falls, boating on Kodai Lake, Bryant Park, Guna Caves, Pillar Rocks.

Description: UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its ancient temples and rock-cut sculptures.
Activities: Shore Temple, Five Rathas, Arjuna's Penance, Krishna's Butterball, Crocodile Bank.

Description: Cultural center known for its magnificent Brihadeeswarar Temple and bronze sculptures.
Activities: Brihadeeswarar Temple, Thanjavur Maratha Palace, Saraswathi Mahal Library, Art Gallery, exploring local markets.

Description: Island town famous for its Ramanathaswamy Temple and holy significance.
Activities: Ramanathaswamy Temple, Dhanushkodi Beach, Pamban Bridge, witnessing sunrise/sunset, boat rides.

Description: Temple town known for its silk sarees and numerous ancient temples.
Activities: Ekambareswarar Temple, Kamakshi Amman Temple, Kanchi Kudil, Kanchipuram Silk Saree shopping.

Description: Hill station offering a peaceful escape with trekking, boating, and adventure activities.
Activities: Trekking, boating on Punganoor Lake, Yelagiri Mountain Bike Challenge, paragliding, spelunking.
